Name: Raspberry Watkins
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: A light, long, fizzy and refreshing drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Raspberry Watkins contains 209 calories
